data_table.description: MESA Ancillary Study Dataset: MESA Classic CT measures of Abdominal Body Composition.

variable.name: sidno
variable.description: SHARE ID NUMBER

variable.name: ctexam
variable.description: EXAM CORRESPONDING TO CT SCAN

variable.name: ctexamtt
variable.description: TIME FROM BASELINE EXAM TO CT SCAN

variable.name: slicenum3
variable.description: NUMBER OF CT SLICE MEASURED (0 LOWEST AT L4/L5, 5 HIGHEST AT L2/L3)

variable.name: pixelsize3
variable.description: SIZE OF PIXEL USED BY CT SCANNER

variable.name: slicethickness3
variable.description: THICKNESS OF CT SCAN SLICE (MM)

variable.name: abtot3
variable.description: TOTAL ABDOMINAL AREA (IN SQ CM)

variable.name: abfat3
variable.description: TOTAL ABDOMINAL FAT AREA (IN SQ CM)

variable.name: ablean3
variable.description: TOTAL ABDOMINAL LEAN AREA (IN SQ CM)

variable.name: abfathu3
variable.description: MEAN HOUNSFIELD VALUE FOR TOTAL ABDOMINAL FAT AREA

variable.name: ableanhu3
variable.description: MEAN HOUNSFIELD VALUE FOR TOTAL ABDOMINAL LEAN AREA

variable.name: abtothu3
variable.description: MEAN HOUNSFIELD VALUE FOR TOTAL ABDOMINAL AREA

variable.description: TOTAL SUBCUTANEOUS AREA (IN SQ CM)

variable.name: subqtothu3
variable.description: MEAN HOUNSFIELD VALUE FOR TOTAL SUBCUTANEOUS AREA
